hackathon-description-text: It will be a two-day event comprising of coding contests, Expert talks and workshops on free and open source softwares and a 28-hour hackathon. Ideas on various important issues will be shared with many of enthusiastic developers and coders.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Overall feasibility and functioning of app
How your project is unique and different from the ones already created
Which technology you have used and how much updated you are
How much it is implementable with reasons
How friendly your user interface is
